name: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg (2003)
name_original: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg (2003)
description: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg (ジャイアントエッグ～ビリー・ハッチャーの大冒険～, Jaianto Eggu: Birī Hatchā no Daibōken) is a 2003 video game developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega for the Nintendo GameCube. It was ported to Microsoft Windows and Mac OS X in 2006, for release in Europe.
